17. Give a typical day's menu (breakfast, dinner and supper) for the earliest year you can remember. Give the year and list the members of the family with their ages at the time. State the approximate month, e.g. winter or summer.

Breakfast - oatmeal porridge and brown sugar when I baked.

Dinner - meat bread, butter potatoes, pickles vegetables in season.

Supper - about the same as dinner except dried fruits & cookies instead of pie.

20. Mention any outstanding differences in the preparation of meals in the earliest days as compared with today.

Much more canned goods used today, also frozen foods, fresh foods. Everyone had homemade bread, their own butter and cured meat in the early days. Fewer vegetables were used, fruits were dried.

21. When did you begin to rely on purchased foods and prepared foods instead of homegrown and home prepared foods? (Give as many details and dates as possible).

Homegrown foods are still used but canned or frozen. We don't buy jam, canned fruit or vegetables except very rarely.
